Bl. 162V2-166R5: Dīrghanakha SĀ(Hos2)
1. // bhagavāṃ rājagṛhe vihara

children.text: ti veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma. upetya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmu
dhām upasaṃhṛtya, ekānte nyaṣīdad. ekāntaniṣaṇṇo dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat.
te, agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamati yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamati, eṣāpi me dṛṣṭir na kṣamati, yeyaṃ me dṛṣṭiḥ

sarvaṃ me na kṣamati.
3. api nu te
agnivaiśyāyana, evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ, anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apra
durbhāvaḥ. api me bho gautama, evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ, anyasyāś ca dṛ
bahujanena te, agnivaiśyāyana saṃsyadiṣyati, bahujano 'pi evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati, evaṃvādī. tva
m api syāt tādṛśa eva ye kecid
agnivaiśyāyana śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratiniḥsṛjanty anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādante. ima
traya ime, agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭisaṃniśrayāḥ. katame trayaḥ. ihāgnivaiśyāyana, eka evaṃdṛṣṭi
sarvaṃ me kṣamati. punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati, evaṃvādī. sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati, evaṃ
tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamati. iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ saṃrāgāya saṃvartate nāsaṃrāgāya saṃdve

dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. iyaṃ dṛṣṭir asaṃrāgāya saṃ
na saṃdveṣāya, asaṃmohāya na saṃmohāya, asaṃyogāya na saṃyogāya, vyavadānāya na saṃkleśāya, asaṃcayāya na saṃcayā

mati. ekatyaṃ me na kṣamati yat t
āvad asya kṣamati tat saṃrāgāya saṃvartate nāsaṃrāgāya pūrvavad yāvad adhyavasānāya saṃvartate yad a
sya na kṣamati tad asaṃrāgāya saṃ
vartate na saṃrāgāya pūrvavad yāvad anadhyavasānāya saṃvartate.
vaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syām evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me kṣamati, dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ. yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ

nyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisandhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ.
tatra śrutavān āryaśrāvaka itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣati, ahaṃ ced evaṃ

me na kṣamati. vigrahe sati vivādo vivāde sati vihiṃsā pūrvavad yāvad apratisandhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ.

rdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādo y
aś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me kṣamati yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī sarvaṃ me na kṣamati. vigrahe sati vivādaḥ pūrva
ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika āryaśrāvakeṇa, abhīkṣaṇam anityā
nupaśyinā virāgānupaśyinā nirodhānupaśyinā pratiniḥsargānupaśyinā vihartavyam. yatrāryaśrāvaka
vyayānupaśyino virāgānupaśyino nirodhānupaśyinaḥ pratiniḥsargānupaśyino viharato yo 'sya bha
āyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānaṃ tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādā
agnivaiśyāyana vedanāḥ. katamās tisraḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ca. i
ānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhavāḥ. itīmā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ
arśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayanti. tasya tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante vyupa
sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayati sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā, aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vā tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cā
saraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti. sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayam cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥ
tāsu utpannāsu vedanāsv anityānupaśyī viharati vyayānupaśyī virāgānupaśyī nirodhānupaśyī pratiniḥsargānu
aparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ veda
vedayāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. bhedāc ca kāyasyordhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi
dhyante. apariśeṣam adhyastaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti.
tasyaivaṃ bhavati sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayāno
ti, eṣa evānto duḥkhasya. duḥkhām apy aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayāno bhedāt kāyasya bhaviṣyati, e
sa sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ. duḥkhām apy aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto
aḥ. kena visaṃyuktaḥ. visaṃyukto rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena visaṃyukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopā
tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ chāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhū
yan. athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat. bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati vi
sargam eva varṇayati. athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānupaśyinaḥ viharato vyayā
nirodhānupaśyinaḥ pratiniḥsargānupaśyino viharataḥ. anupādāyāsravebhaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ.

dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam. atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṃkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ pra
labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'nti
nakhaḥ parivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam. evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyu
ḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti. pūrvavad yāvad arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ.
